access: You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Explosive Savant](/Feats.aspx?ID=3283) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 200</row>

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

</column>

---

A lifetime wielding firearms and explosive ordinance amid the chaos of battle has granted you great skill with volatile weapons. You become trained in simple and martial bombs and firearms.

<title level="2">Explosive Savant leads to...</title>
[Explosive Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=3290)
name: Explosive Savant
